description: Wear Mammut, be Mammut – every day. This organic cotton and polyester t-shirt brings the best of both worlds: it feels soft and light, wicks moisture away from your skin, and dries quickly. It’s a wardrobe must-have that goes with just about everything. And we love it! What about you?
name: Mammut Mammut Core T-Shirt Classic - Mens

specs.value: 50% organic cotton, 50% recycled polyester- organic cotton recycled polyester knit
